A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
1. This film is a giant middle finger to true Star Wars fans who follow the lore.
2. This film is dripping with regressive identity politics.
3. The director had no intention of using some of his characters\, so he sent them on a useless 40 minute mission which has no impact on anything.
4. Rey is still such an obvious Mary Sue\, it's painful to watch.
5. I would sit through all 3 prequels before watching this again.
